Text: nice!  I've been looking for this for days.  Also very cool username!

Thanks a lot for this- probably the only way on Earth that you can hear it outside of the theater, for some reason (wouldn't they want to make more money by selling the soundtrack?).  Too bad that there's someone talking  through it and ruining it.  I have to say, though, that it was almost awe-inspiring when I first heard it in the theater.  For some reason it makes me wonder about the many sequels to come.
